title: How to Get Started in Half Life

steps.headline: First, wait for the train to stop in the train station, and wait for the guard to open the door.
Wait for the guard to open the doors.
steps.description: You will find yourself in a reception.

steps.headline: Follow the right passage till you find the locker room.
Go to the right, and push the center button.
steps.description: An HEV suit will pop out, grab it.

steps.headline: Then walk in the passages, following the red line on the walls, until you find yourself in room with 3 scientists.
steps.description: Wait for them to open the door.

steps.headline: You will find more scientists, they will open the doors for you after a short conversation.
Then, while you are in the Test Chamber, climb up the ladder on your right, and push the red button in the computer.
Wait for instructions, until a "transportation device" pops out of the floor, grab it to the center ray.
Everything will explode, and everything will be destroyed.
steps.description: Walk through the door and continue your way out.
